name: The Benefits of Teleportation
description:
PARTS OF THIS GAME WILL NOT BE EXPLAINED WELL OR AT ALL, AND MAY NOT WORK. THERE IS NO END (yet); DO NOT EXPECT TOO MUCH

This game was at first just a school project, but I decided to take it a little farther. I will add a bundle of updates every now and again, and while they may be content heavy, they might be few and far between.

You play as a person drafted for some kind of teleportation experiment gone wrong. I don't have a more fleshed out story than that. You can move boxes and walk around inside a massive organism, but it is nowhere near where I would like it to be.

I have disabled donations because that money, I can guarantee, is better spent elsewhere.

Made with Gdevelop, everything else I made myself.
